problem.markdown: Which of the following are assumptions made while deriving the conservation of mass equation? [ ] There is no heat interaction with surroundings [ ] Velocities at inlet and outlet are the same [ ] Rate of mass entering must be equal to rate of mass exiting [ ] Area of inlet must be equal to area of outlet [x] None of the above
problem.p: Which of the following are assumptions made while deriving the conservation of mass equation?

checkboxgroup.choice: There is no heat interaction with surroundings
Velocities at inlet and outlet are the same
Rate of mass entering must be equal to rate of mass exiting
Area of inlet must be equal to area of outlet
